title: Celestine Soraka Hair Movement
body: [GAMEPLAY] After the launch of her new rework I went online to play Celestine Soraka, I noticed her hair movement is weird and not natural. It didn't move the same way before the rework. Please can we have it fixed, it bugs me and possibly other player.
